short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to get you started with managing several websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ultimate Webmaster is currently "bookmarks on steroids". It lets you open a Group and / or a Set of Pages at the click of a button. 

Groups will open a list of URLs in a click. 

Page sets let you open a set of pages based on a list of "roots" with just one click. For example, if you configure 2 roots: 
* https://www.example.com
* https://www.anotherexamplesite.com

Then you can have a single button to open: 
* https://www.example.com/about
* https://www.anotherexamplesite.com/about
